items.desc:

(All sources of Spell Power are @APPercentAmp@% more effective)
items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap

items.desc: Grants +@CriticalStrikeAmp@% Critical Strike Damage.

items.desc: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies by @AttackSpeedSlow@%. Each Frozen Heart a champion carries beyond the first increases the radius of this effect.
items.name: Frozen Heart

items.desc:
The wearer is also Light.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Talisman of Light

items.desc: Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToSilence@% chance on-hit to silence the target, preventing mana gain for @SilenceDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Hush

items.desc:
When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by @CostIncrease@% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Shroud of Stillness

items.desc: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for @HealthRestore@ Health.

items.desc:

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Warden's Mail

items.desc:

items.desc: This champion starts combat with 30 additional mana.

items.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain +@AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
items.name: Zeke's Herald

items.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three Item Slots]
items.name: Thief's Gloves

items.desc:
Basic Attacks grant +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.
items.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade

items.desc: Enemies within @HexRange@ hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by @MRShred@% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to @ManaRatio@% of their max Mana.
items.name: Ionic Spark

items.desc: Reduces incoming magic damage by @MagicReduction@%.
items.name: Dragon's Claw

items.desc:
Critical hits against the wearer deal normal damage instead.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Phantom Dancer

items.desc: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for @StunDuration@ seconds.
items.name: Trap Claw

items.desc:
The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

items.name: Celestial Orb

items.desc: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal @1StarAoEDamage@/@2StarAoEDamage@/@3StarAoEDamage@ %i:star% magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every @ICD@ seconds).
items.name: Bramble Vest

items.desc: +@Armor@ Armor
items.name: Chain Vest

items.desc: After casting a spell, the wearer's next Basic Attack freezes the target for @FreezeDuration@ seconds.

items.name: Spell Thief

items.desc: The wearer's Basic Attacks deal an additional @CurrentHPPhysicalDamage@% of the target's current Health as physical damage.

items.name: Inferno Hex

items.desc:
The holder's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing @BurnPercent@% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over @BurnDuration@ seconds, and reducing healing by @GrievousWoundsPercent@%, for the duration of the burn.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Red Buff

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed and +@CritChancePerStack@% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

No stacking limit.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

  • Basic attacks and spells deal +@TraitMultiplier@% Damage
  • Basic attacks heal @TraitMultiplier@ Health on-hit

items.desc: Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToShrink@% chance on-hit to decrease the target's star level by 1 for the rest of combat.
items.name: Cursed Blade

items.desc: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After @StasisDuration@ seconds, they return with @HealthRestore@ Health and shed all negative effects.
items.name: Guardian Angel

items.desc: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a @DamageIncreasePercent@% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to @StackCap@ times, at which point the wearer gains @BonusResistsAtStackCap@ Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

Contributing to a kill grants +@ADPerStack@ Attack Damage for the remainder of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times (starting at @StartingStacks@).

items.desc: The wearer regenerates @HealthRegen@% of their missing Health, but not more than @MaxHealthRegenAmount@, per second.

ability.desc: Ziggs throws a bomb at an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Bomb!

ability.desc:
Passive: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemy units!

After her first takedown, Jinx gains @PercentAttackSpeed@ bonus Attack Speed.

After her second takedown, Jinx swaps to her rocket launcher, causing her Basic Attacks to deal @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area around her target.
ability.name: Get Excited!

ability.desc: Sona heals @NumberOfTargets@ injured allies for @ModifiedHealing@ and cleanses them of stuns.
ability.name: Aria of Perseverance

ability.desc: Yasuo blinks to the farthest enemy in range, knocks them up for @StunDuration@ seconds, and Attacks them @ModifiedAttacks@ times (applies on-hit effects).
ability.name: Last Breath

ability.desc: Passive: Malphite starts combat with a shield equal to @ModifiedPercentHealth@ of his maximum health.
ability.name: Energy Shield

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds Master Yi gains massively increased movement speed, heals for @ModifiedHeal@ of his maximum health each second, and deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus true damage with his Basic Attacks.
ability.name: Chosen One

ability.desc:
Aurelion Sol launches fighters which fly out to random enemies, deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, and then return. Aurelion Sol launches all ready fighters, plus @FightersPerCast@ more, when he casts.

Fighters prefer to target nearby enemies.
ability.name: Mobilize the Fleet

ability.desc: Miss Fortune channels and fires waves of bullets in a cone for @ChannelDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedPercentHealth@ of enemies' maximum health in magic damage over the duration.
ability.name: Bullet Time

ability.desc: Kai'Sa launches @NumMissiles@ missiles towards each nearby enemy that deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Missile Rain

ability.desc: Kayle Ascends, causing her attacks to launch waves that deal @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Ascend

ability.desc:
Ekko shatters the timeline, freezing all units in time before attacking each enemy with @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage and applying on-hit effects.

Ekko cannot die while he has stopped time.
ability.name: Chronobreak

ability.desc: Fiora enters a defensive stance for @BlockDuration@ seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. As she exits this stance, she ripostes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to a nearby enemy and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Riposte

ability.desc: Vi charges at the farthest enemy, knocking aside all enemies in her path and dealing them @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ magic damage. When she reaches her target, she knocks them up for @CCDuration@ seconds and deals @ModifiedPrimaryDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Assault and Battery

ability.desc: Irelia dashes to her target, Basic Attacking them for @ModifiedPercentAD@ of her Attack Damage. If this kills the target, she Bladesurges again immediately at the enemy with the highest mana. (Total Damage: @TooltipDamage@)
ability.name: Bladesurge

ability.desc: Poppy throws her buckler at the furthest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks @ModifiedShield@ damage.
ability.name: Buckler Toss

ability.desc: Soraka heals all of her allies for @ModifiedHeal@.
ability.name: Wish

ability.desc: Ahri fires an orb in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through on the way out, and @ModifiedDamage@ true damage on the way back.
ability.name: Orb of Deception

ability.desc:
Syndra pulls in all orbs on the battlefield and creates @Spheres@ new ones, then fires them all at the enemy with the highest current Health percentage, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage per orb.

Lowest total health breaks targeting ties.
ability.name: Unleashed Power

ability.desc: Neeko leaps into the air and slams into the ground, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Pop Blossom

ability.desc: Gangplank calls down an orbital strike around his target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ damage to all enemies in a large area after @ImpactDelayTime@ seconds.
ability.name: Orbital Strike

ability.desc:
Darius dunks an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again.

Targets below @HealthThreshold@% health take double damage.
ability.name: Dreadnova Guillotine

ability.desc: Jayce slams his hammer, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies.
ability.name: To the Skies!

ability.desc: Annie blasts a cone of fire dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a shield with @ModifiedShield@ health for herself for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Galaxy Shield-Blast

ability.desc: Fizz throws a lure that attracts a shark. It deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies caught, knocking them back and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Chum the Waters

ability.desc: Rumble torches his enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over @Duration@ seconds, and reducing healing on them by @GrievousWoundsPercent@% for @GrievousWoundsDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Flamespitter

ability.desc: Cho'Gath ruptures a large area, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and knocking up all enemies within for @KnockDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Rupture

ability.desc: Kha'Zix slashes the nearest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If the enemy has no adjacent allies, this damage is increased to @ModifiedIsolationDamage@.
ability.name: Taste their Fear

ability.desc: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that sweeps across the battlefield over @ChannelDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage per second to enemies hit.
ability.name: Lifeform Disintegration Ray

ability.desc: Ezreal fires an electromagnetic pulse at a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ damage to all nearby enemies and increasing the cost of their next spellcast by @PercentCostIncrease@%.
ability.name: E.M.P.

ability.desc: Shen creates a zone around himself for @ZoneDuration@ seconds, in which all nearby allies automatically dodge incoming Basic Attacks. While it's active, Shen gains @ModifiedMR@ Magic Resist.
ability.name: Future's Refuge

ability.desc: Wukong spins, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies over @Duration@ seconds. The first time Wukong hits each enemy, he knocks them into the air and stuns them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Cyclone

ability.desc: Thresh tosses his lantern towards @UnitCount@ random unit(s) on your bench, pulling them into combat and granting them @ModifiedMana@ bonus Mana. Traits are unaffected.
ability.name: Temporal Passage

ability.desc: Caitlyn takes aim at the farthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
ability.name: Ace In The Hole

ability.desc: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to each enemy they pass through.
ability.name: Wild Cards

ability.desc: Xin Zhao quickly strikes his target three times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects. The third strike knocks his target up for @StunDuration@ seconds and deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Three Talon Strike

ability.desc: Lulu polymorphs the @NumTargets@ nearest enemies for @Duration@ seconds, causing them to hop aimlessly, unable to attack or cast. Polymorphed enemies take @ModifiedBonusDamage@ additional damage from all sources.
ability.name: Mass Polymorph

ability.desc: Kassadin releases a wave of energy in front of him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and disarming all targets hit for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Force Pulse

ability.desc: Xayah creates a storm of feather-blades, gaining @ModifiedAS@ Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Deadly Plumage

ability.desc: Rakan dashes to the furthest enemy within range and leaps into the air, knocking them up for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Grand Entrance

ability.desc: Ashe fires an arrow at the farthest enemy that explodes on the first target hit, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies and stunning them for @StunDurationPerSquare@ seconds.
ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow

ability.desc: Mordekaiser gains a shield for that absorbs @ModifiedShield@ damage over @Duration@ seconds. While the shield persists, Mordekaiser deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage per second to all nearby enemies.
ability.name: Indestructible

ability.desc: Lux fires a sphere of darkness towards the farthest enemy. Enemies in its path take @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and are stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Lurid Binding

ability.desc: Shaco teleports and backstabs his target for @TooltipPercentage@ of his Basic Attack damage. This is also always a critical hit. (Total: @TooltipADBonus@)
ability.name: Deceive

ability.desc: Jarvan calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting all nearby allies @ModifiedAS@ Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Ageless Standard

ability.desc:
At start of combat, Karma bonds to her closest ally.

Karma grants the bonded ally (or a random one if that ally is dead) a @ModifiedShield@-health shield for @Duration@ seconds. While the shield holds, the ally receives @ModifiedAS@ bonus Attack Speed.
ability.name: Inspire

ability.desc:
Passive: Jhin converts each 1% of bonus Attack Speed he has into 0.8 Attack Damage.

Passive: Every fourth shot, Jhin deals @ModifiedPercent@ damage. (Total: @TooltipDamage@)
ability.name: Whisper

ability.desc:
Zoe kicks a bubble at the enemy with the the highest current Health percentage, stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.

Highest total health breaks targeting ties.
ability.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

ability.desc:
Blitzcrank pulls the farthest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

His next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second.

Allies within range will prefer to attack Blitzcrank's target.
ability.name: Rocket Grab

ability.desc: Leona creates a barrier, reducing all incoming damage by @ModifiedDamageReduction@ for 4 seconds.
ability.name: Cyber Barrier

ability.desc: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then Basic Attacks them and fires a second shot which deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Relentless Pursuit

ability.desc: Kayn swings his scythe, dealing @Damage@ to enemies in a line.
ability.name: Blade's Reach

ability.desc: Kayn temporarily infests the furthest enemy, dealing @TargetDamage@ to the target when he bursts out.
ability.name: Umbral Trespass

ability.desc:
Passive: The Super-Mech's attacks cleave the area in front of it.

The Super-Mech calls down a devastating blast at its target's location, dealing @ModifiedMainDamage@ magic damage to its target and @ModifiedSplashDamage@ magic damage to all other nearby enemies.

This spell's damage increases with the Star Level of the Super-Mech's Pilots.
ability.name: Mecha Justice

ability.desc: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward the enemy with the most Attack Speed. The grenade explodes on impact dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies and causing their attacks to miss for @BlindDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Smoke Grenade

ability.desc: Xerath transforms, summoning meteors to strike random foes in place of his normal attacks for @Duration@ seconds. Meteors deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage upon impact and if they kill their target, all adjacent enemies take @ModifiedAoEDamage@ magic damage and are stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Abyssal Bombardment

traits.desc:
All allies gain @PercentAttackSpeed@% Attack Speed every few seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @Frequency@ seconds
traits.name: Chrono

traits.desc:
At the start of combat, Rebels gain a shield and bonus damage for each adjacent Rebel. The shield lasts for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield & @DamageAmp@% Damage
traits.name: Rebel

traits.desc:
Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow on a Champion there is a chance to drop extra loot.

(@MinUnits@) @CoinDropChance@% for 1 gold
(@MinUnits@) @CoinDropChance@% for 1 gold and @ItemDropChance@% for a component item
traits.name: Space Pirate

traits.desc: <expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Mana-Reaver attacks increase the mana cost of their target's next spellcast by @CostIncreasePercent@%.</expandRow>
traits.name: Mana-Reaver

traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline.

Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds at the start of combat, refreshed on takedown.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent@% bonus Attack Speed
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent@% bonus Attack Speed
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent@% bonus Attack Speed
traits.name: Infiltrator

traits.desc:
When a Dark Star Champion dies, all other allied Dark Star Champions gain Attack Damage and Spell Power

(@MinUnits@) +@ADandSP@ Attack Damage and Spell Power
traits.name: Dark Star

traits.desc: <expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Snipers deal @PercentDamageIncrease@% increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.</expandRow>
traits.name: Sniper

traits.desc:
Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger two additional attacks against their target.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to trigger
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to trigger
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to trigger
traits.name: Blademaster

traits.desc:
All allies have increased Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) @AP@% Spell Power
traits.name: Sorcerer

traits.desc:
Brawlers gain bonus Maximum Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Bonus Health
traits.name: Brawler

traits.desc: Innate: Starships gain @ManaPerSecond@ mana per second, maneuver around the board, and are immune to movement impairing effects, but can't make Basic Attacks.
traits.name: Starship

traits.desc:
All allies gain Magic Resistance.

(@MinUnits@) @MagicResist@ Magic Resistance
traits.name: Mystic

traits.desc: <expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stuns their targets for @StunDuration@ seconds. (Once per spellcast)</expandRow>
traits.name: Demolitionist

traits.desc:
Protectors shield themselves for @Duration@ seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercent@% Maximum Health Shield
traits.name: Protector

traits.desc:
Cybernetic champions with at least one item (component or full) gain Health and Attack Damage.

(@MinUnits@) @HealthAmp@ Health and @ADAmp@ Attack Damage
traits.name: Cybernetic

traits.desc:
Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blaster fires additional attacks at random enemies.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks, trigger on-hit effects, and can critically hit.

(@MinUnits@) @AdditionalAttacks@ Additional Attacks
traits.name: Blaster

traits.desc: Innate: Upgrades for Mercenaries' spells have a chance to appear in the shop.
traits.name: Mercenary

traits.desc:
All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @HealPercent@% Healing
traits.name: Celestial

traits.desc:
Star Guardians' spellcasts grant Mana to other Star Guardians, spread among them.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaRestore@ Total Mana
traits.name: Star Guardian

traits.desc:
Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor.

(@MinUnits@) @Armor@ Armor
traits.name: Vanguard

traits.desc: <expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Valkyrie attacks and spells always critically hit targets below @PercentHealth@% health. </expandRow>
traits.name: Valkyrie

traits.desc: (@MinUnits@) Attacks and spells from Void champions deal true damage.
traits.name: Void

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, three random Mech-Pilots are teleported into a Super-Mech.

The Super-Mech has the combined Health, Attack Damage, and Traits of its pilots, as well as 3 random items from among them.

When the Super-Mech dies the Pilots are ejected and continue to fight.
traits.name: Mech-Pilot
